"},{"name":"wikified","value":"true"},{"name":"created","value":"1524030820772"},{"name":"updated","value":"1524048518176"},{"name":"updaterName","value":"maksimrv"},{"name":"updaterFullName","value":"Maksim Ryzhikov"},{"name":"reporterName","value":"jk"},{"name":"reporterFullName","value":"Evgeny Naumenko"},{"name":"commentsCount","value":"3"},{"name":"votes","value":"0"},{"name":"markdown","value":"true"},{"name":"State","value":["Open"],"valueId":["Open"],"color":{"bg":"#fed74a","fg":"#444"}},{"name":"Subsystem","value":["Infrastructure"],"valueId":["Infrastructure"],"color":null},{"name":"Component","value":["Frontend"],"valueId":["Frontend"],"color":null},{"name":"Type","value":["Task"],"valueId":["Task"],"color":null},{"name":"Priority","value":["Normal"],"valueId":["Normal"],"color":{"bg":"#e6f6cf","fg":"#4da400"}},{"name":"sprint","value":[{"value":"sprint 65","id":"YouTrack:sprint 65"}]}],"comment":[{"id":"27-2827881","author":"maksimrv","authorFullName":"Maksim Ryzhikov","issueId":"JT-46837","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"

Hm... From error above, I see we get 499 error status code when trying to get config.
Any ideas why?
Maybe Nginx process requests too long and a bot just close connection

","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1524037890002,"updated":null,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":true,"replies":[]},{"id":"27-2828117","author":"jk","authorFullName":"Evgeny Naumenko","issueId":"JT-46837","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"

@Maksim Ryzhikov HTTP 499 stands for "client closed the connection" in general. I doubt we have a timeout here since config endpoint is quite fast.

","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1524044072784,"updated":null,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":true,"replies":[]},{"id":"27-2828307","author":"maksimrv","authorFullName":"Maksim Ryzhikov","issueId":"JT-46837","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"

@Evgeny Naumenko

I doubt we have a timeout here since config endpoint is quite fast.

Unfortunately no

STR:
  • Attach a WF with some requirements to project.
  • Check out project WF tab.
  • Deactivate the rule with non-applied quick fixes.
ER:
Quick fixes are still suggested.
AR:
Only 'requires setup' tag is shown, without suggestions. This is quite misleading, as I can't check a problem out until I activate the rule.
"},{"name":"wikified","value":"true"},{"name":"created","value":"1485344303133"},{"name":"updated","value":"1523888135895"},{"name":"updaterName","value":"Anna.Zhdan"},{"name":"updaterFullName","value":"Anna Zhdan"},{"name":"reporterName","value":"mary"},{"name":"reporterFullName","value":"Mariya Davydova"},{"name":"commentsCount","value":"0"},{"name":"votes","value":"0"},{"name":"markdown","value":"false"},{"name":"links","value":[{"value":"JT-39715","type":"Relates","role":"relates to"},{"value":"YTB-847","type":"Subtask","role":"subtask of"}]},{"name":"State","value":["Open"],"valueId":["Open"],"color":{"bg":"#fed74a","fg":"#444"}},{"name":"Subsystem","value":["Workflow"],"valueId":["Workflow"],"color":null},{"name":"Component","value":["Frontend"],"valueId":["Frontend"],"color":null},{"name":"Type","value":["Usability Problem"],"valueId":["Usability Problem"],"color":null},{"name":"Priority","value":["Normal"],"valueId":["Normal"],"color":{"bg":"#e6f6cf","fg":"#4da400"}},{"name":"sprint","value":[{"value":"sprint 65","id":"YouTrack:sprint 65"}]}],"comment":[],"tag":[]}, {"id":"JT-36108","entityId":"25-1232107","jiraId":null,"field":[{"name":"projectShortName","value":"JT"},{"name":"numberInProject","value":"36108"},{"name":"summary","value":"List of workflow problems not updated after quickfix apply"},{"name":"description","value":"
STR
  1. attach default workflow "Pomodoro Timer v2" to some project
  2. see "requires setup"
  3. go to rules
  4. press one quickfix
  5. same quickfix remains for other rules
"},{"name":"wikified","value":"true"},{"name":"created","value":"1466409468876"},{"name":"updated","value":"1523888135892"},{"name":"updaterName","value":"Anna.Zhdan"},{"name":"updaterFullName","value":"Anna Zhdan"},{"name":"reporterName","value":"pavel.nikitin"},{"name":"reporterFullName","value":"Pavel Nikitin"},{"name":"commentsCount","value":"1"},{"name":"votes","value":"0"},{"name":"markdown","value":"false"},{"name":"links","value":[{"value":"JT-39935","type":"Relates","role":"relates to"},{"value":"YTB-847","type":"Subtask","role":"subtask of"}]},{"name":"State","value":["Open"],"valueId":["Open"],"color":{"bg":"#fed74a","fg":"#444"}},{"name":"Subsystem","value":["Workflow"],"valueId":["Workflow"],"color":null},{"name":"Component","value":["Frontend","Settings"],"valueId":["Frontend","Settings"],"color":null},{"name":"Type","value":["Usability Problem"],"valueId":["Usability Problem"],"color":null},{"name":"Priority","value":["Normal"],"valueId":["Normal"],"color":{"bg":"#e6f6cf","fg":"#4da400"}},{"name":"sprint","value":[{"value":"sprint 65","id":"YouTrack:sprint 65"}]}],"comment":[{"id":"27-1514706","author":"mary","authorFullName":"Mariya Davydova","issueId":"JT-36108","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"
I do not think that it is Major because it no harm in reapplying the same fix (it is just not applied if the entity is already added).
","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1468404743182,"updated":null,"permittedGroup":"youtrack-developers","markdown":false,"replies":[]}],"tag":[]}, {"id":"JT-31751","entityId":"25-1006840","jiraId":null,"field":[{"name":"projectShortName","value":"JT"},{"name":"numberInProject","value":"31751"},{"name":"summary","value":"Do not poll mailbox statuses if no server is set "},{"name":"description","value":"
http://unit-599:9000/api/admin/integrations/mailbox/mailboxes
"},{"name":"wikified","value":"true"},{"name":"created","value":"1441022909318"},{"name":"updated","value":"1523888135891"},{"name":"updaterName","value":"Anna.Zhdan"},{"name":"updaterFullName","value":"Anna Zhdan"},{"name":"reporterName","value":"xi-eye"},{"name":"reporterFullName","value":"Alexander Anisimov"},{"name":"commentsCount","value":"5"},{"name":"votes","value":"0"},{"name":"markdown","value":"false"},{"name":"links","value":[{"value":"YTB-847","type":"Subtask","role":"subtask of"}]},{"name":"State","value":["Open"],"valueId":["Open"],"color":{"bg":"#fed74a","fg":"#444"}},{"name":"Subsystem","value":["Mailbox"],"valueId":["Mailbox"],"color":null},{"name":"Component","value":["Frontend","Settings"],"valueId":["Frontend","Settings"],"color":null},{"name":"Type","value":["Performance Problem"],"valueId":["Performance Problem"],"color":{"bg":"#fed74a","fg":"#444"}},{"name":"Priority","value":["Normal"],"valueId":["Normal"],"color":{"bg":"#e6f6cf","fg":"#4da400"}},{"name":"sprint","value":[{"value":"7.0","id":"old YouTrack board:7.0"},{"value":"sprint 65","id":"YouTrack:sprint 65"}]}],"comment":[{"id":"27-1104379","author":"rekolobov","authorFullName":"Roman Kolobov","issueId":"JT-31751","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"
Alexander Anisimov I'm not sure why you want to completely purge the ticker for this case, since it's not very demanding to the backend, as far as I can see (not sure about the browser, though). I'd rather suggest to increase polling interval (say, to 10s or even more).
Also, I find it rather strange that when I have two tabs with mailbox integration settings open and add a mailbox in one of them, the other one remains silent about this change. Is it by design or should I file a bug?
","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1441024325882,"updated":null,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":false,"replies":[]},{"id":"27-1104393","author":"mary","authorFullName":"Mariya Davydova","issueId":"JT-31751","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"
Roman Kolobov
  • 10 seconds is too much, your mailbox fetching is basically much faster, and we want to show the progress.
  • As for 2 tabs - it's as designed. We do not support life admin pages and poll only statuses, not the entire data.
","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1441024683924,"updated":null,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":false,"replies":[]},{"id":"27-1104410","author":"rekolobov","authorFullName":"Roman Kolobov","issueId":"JT-31751","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"

In that case, my first comment could be completely disregarded.

","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1438953663378,"updated":null,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":false,"replies":[]},{"id":"27-1111607","author":"xi-eye","authorFullName":"Alexander Anisimov","issueId":"JT-31218","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"
Pavel Nikitin does GAP REST support workflow stuff?
","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1441884495052,"updated":null,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":false,"replies":[]},{"id":"27-2767698","author":"pasha","authorFullName":"Pavel Nikolaev","issueId":"JT-31218","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"

Project custom field of type [state] with attached state machine will be returned as a separate $type and extended with a property:

{
  $type: StateMachineProjectCustomField 
  hasStateMachine: true
}
","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1521718139793,"updated":null,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":true,"replies":[]},{"id":"27-2769206","author":"Leonid.Stryuk","authorFullName":"Leonid Stryuk","issueId":"JT-31218","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"
state machine data is available into
field.plugins.workflow = {
hasStateMachine:boolean
}

NB do not request this data everywhere, cause it is required only on admin pages
","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1521736158974,"updated":null,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":false,"replies":[]},{"id":"27-2769218","author":"Leonid.Stryuk","authorFullName":"Leonid Stryuk","issueId":"JT-31218","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"
StateMachineProjectCustomField

Pavel Nikolaev that is true for IssueCustomField.
","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1521736602038,"updated":null,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":false,"replies":[]},{"id":"27-2769370","author":"pasha","authorFullName":"Pavel Nikolaev","issueId":"JT-31218","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"

@Leonid Stryuk, no it's about ProjectCustomField, for IssueCustomField it's StateMachineIssueCustomField

","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1521738604154,"updated":null,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":true,"replies":[]},{"id":"27-2769405","author":"pasha","authorFullName":"Pavel Nikolaev","issueId":"JT-31218","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"
